ground_truth.thought: 我想研究乡村经济，首先，从权威经济报告中获取3篇关于乡村经济发展趋势的分析文章。然后，获取某乡村近五年农产品的销售数据。接着，查询该乡村当前的特色产业项目信息。最后，通过乡村名称获取其地理位置和交通状况，并获取一些针对该乡村经济发展的政策支持。
ground_truth.name: ResearchRuralEconomy.get_rural_economy_data

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'EconomicReports.get_rural_trends', 'description': 'Get 3 authoritative economic reports on rural economic development trends.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the query term for rural economic trends'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reports', 'description': 'a list of 3 economic reports'}]}, {'name': 'AgriculturalData.get_sales_data', 'description': 'Get the sales data of agricultural products in a village for the past five years.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'village', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the village'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'sales_data', 'description': 'a list of sales data for the past five years'}]}, {'name': 'SpecialProjects.get_current_projects', 'description': 'Query the current special industry projects in a village.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'village', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the village'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'projects', 'description': 'a list of current special industry projects'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolicySupport.get_rural_economy_policies', 'description': 'Get policy support for rural economic development by village name.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'village', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the village'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policies', 'description': 'a list of policy support for rural economic development'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名乡村经济研究者，正在研究一个特定乡村的经济状况。首先，我需要从权威经济报告中获取3篇关于乡村经济发展趋势的分析文章。然后，我需要获取这个乡村近五年农产品的销售数据。接着，我想要查询这个乡村当前的特色产业项目信息。最后，我需要通过乡村名称获取其地理位置和交通状况，并获取一些针对该乡村经济发展的政策支持。当前这一步的目标是什么?
从权威经济报告中获取3篇关于乡村经济发展趋势的分析文章
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
EconomicReports.get_rural_trends
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?
village_name
{'reports': ['Report1: Trends in Rural Economic Development', 'Report2: Analysis of Rural Economy Growth', 'Report3: Future Prospects of Rural Industries']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'reports': ['Report1: Trends in Rural Economic Development', 'Report2: Analysis of Rural Economy Growth', 'Report3: Future Prospects of Rural Industries']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

当前工具的参数'village'的值是什么?
village_name
